title: Worked Solution
text:
The line passing through the given points $$(1,-3)$$ and $$(1,4)$$ is a vertical line as the x-coordinates of both points are the same.

The equation of a vertical line passing through a point (a,b) is $$x=a$$.

In this case, the x-coordinate of both points is $$1$$. Therefore, the equation of the line passing through the given points is:

$$x$$ $$=$$ $$1$$
